oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Copy completed on 8 Rajab 918 [September 19, 1512] in the hand of Muḥammad Abū al-Saʻūd al-Jamāl al-Anṣārī.
Ownership statement signed ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Mālikī al-Aḥmadī.
Bound with: Risālat al-Surūr fī ḥaqq wālidayhi ʻalayhi al-salām / Sājaqlīzādah (ff. 1r-8v).
